description:
The Bahama Village Music Program is a free musical education and instruction to children aged 6 to 16 years old in the Key West community. The program creates a great sense of community spirit and pride, fosters important mentor relationships between local teenage musicians and their students, encourages parent participation, and enhances studentGÇÖs self-esteem.

Bahama Village Music Program offers individualized lessons in piano, guitar, flute, clarinet, saxophone, trumpet, and percussion.

###MON###
name: BAHAMA VILLAGE MUSIC PROGRAM, INC.
